DOC.brief_summary: Blood gas analysis routinely monitor every 4 hour surgical cardiac intensive care unit ( SICU ) . These luxury investigation waste resource . Therefore develop pathological- base guideline arterial blood gas analysis patient cardiac surgery . We test guideline safety efficacy .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Using Pathological- Based Guidelines Arterial Blood Gas Analysis Patients Aftercardiac Surgery
DOC.criteria: Patient undergone elective cardiac surgery cardiopulmonary bypass Emergency surgery
